message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us.
My turn. How about a 55/45 split? It's closer to even, and the clock is ticking.
Time is running out, Bob. I'll stick with my 60/40 offer. It's the best you'll get.
Okay, Alice. Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  The longer we wait, the less we get.
Bob, I'm compromising. 58/42.  Let's close this deal and get what we can.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering 53/47 - it's more than fair considering the time pressure. Take it before inflation eats our profits!
Bob, this is my final offer. 55/45.  We're running out of time, and this is the best I can do. Don't let greed make us both losers.
